evidence.claim: NowCerts uses AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The platform integrates with health information systems utilizing HL7 and FHIR standards.
NowCerts employs AWS RDS for relational database services.
API integration patterns are essential to NowCerts' interoperability framework.
NowCerts utilizes AWS S3 for scalable storage solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transaction support or related use cases on their site.
